org.cschallenge.pinball.engine

Interface ITower

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AssaultTowerEast, AssaultTowerNorth, AttackTower, AttackTower2, BlockTower, DefenseCollide, DefenseTower, DefenseTower, EnemyBaseTower, FollowTower2, GavTowerDefence, InstaTowerX, InstaTowerY, RandomTower, ScoutTower, ScoutTower, ScoutTower, SearchTower, SearchTower, SentryTower, ShotTower, ShotTower, TowerQ

    public interface ITower

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean extinguish(int turn)
      Called once per turn.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        TowerPosition initialize(int turn)
        Called once and only once, when a tower is created. Towers are created at the end of a player's turn, one per turn, based upon a pending queue. This method must return the position of the tower, which includes coordinates (x,y) and the maximum number of collisions that the tower can sustain before being extinguished. Each time a ball collides with a tower, the remaining number of collisions is reduced by one; when that count reaches zero, the tower is extinguished. A tower can also extinguish itself by responding to extinguish(int).
        Parameters:
        turn -
        Returns:
        the board position and maximum collisions for this tower.

      • onCaptureBall

        Heading onCaptureBall(PinballEngine.TeamType teamType,
                      Heading heading)
        Called when a ball collides with this tower. Upon a collision, a tower can direct the colliding ball in any direction.
        Parameters:
        teamType -
        heading -
        Returns:
        the direction for the colliding ball.

      • onDetectBall

        void onDetectBall(PinballEngine.TeamType teamType,
                  Position position)
        Called when a ball passes within detection range of a tower. Balls are detected within a radius of a maximum of 5 squares (see getDetectionRadius()).
        Parameters:
        teamType -
        position -

      • extinguish

        boolean extinguish(int turn)
        Called once per turn. Returning true causes the tower to be extinguished.
        Parameters:
        turn -
        Returns:
        true to cause the tower to be extinguished; otherwise false.

      • getDetectionRadius

        int getDetectionRadius()
        Called once per turn. Determines the radius at which a ball can be detected. Minimum is zero (no detection), maximum is five squares.
        Returns:
        detection radius.
